name: Legend of the Panty Pirate Usurp Underwear!
name_original: Legend of the Panty Pirate Usurp Underwear!
description:
A succubus wakes up one day to find her favorite pair of pantys stole from the Legendary Panty Pirate who mistakes  them as a eyepatch. she must battle her way through goons to get them back before they are lost forever!

Controls:  W = Move up let go to move down/ Selector

                       D = Move Right let go to move Left/ Confirm

Credits: 

Skyninja空忍者- 3dModeler/Programmer(https://skyninjacid0.wixsite.com/portfolio)

 tfx - Music (https://soundcloud.com/tfx-st)

 This game was made in time for the for the 2 button game jam. If you would like to see this game further developed, please consider leaving a comment and let us know. We would love to hear any ideas, suggestions, or feedback you might have!
